alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Lunenburg; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 6:29PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Mecklenburg, southeastern Lunenburg and west central Brunswick Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 627 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kenbridge, moving southeast at 10 mph. Rotation is being detected with this storm so be alert for any updates. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... South Hill, Brodnax and La Crosse around 715 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lafoon Corner, Gary, Bacons Fork, Wilburn, Gills Corner, Oral Oaks, North View, Meredithville, Forksville and Prices Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects.
